original_title: Man injured in Peliyagoda shooting succumbs
original_body_lines: An individual who was injured in a shooting incident in Peliyagoda earlier today (19), has succumbed to his injuries.
A shooting was reported along the Gnanarathana Mawatha in Peliyagoda.
According to police, the suspects, who arrived on a motorcycle, opened fire, injuring a trader in the Peliyagoda fish market.
